title: How to Make a Powerful JADAM Natural Pesticide by mixing JWA+JS+JHS for Gardeners. Homemade

tasks.task: Prepare and store natural pesticides for garden and farming
subtasks: Boil herbs for JADAM herbal solution
Vacuum seal the herbal solution to store for couple of years
Test JADAM wetting agent (JWA) to check solution usability
Store opened JADAM herbal solution properly using ethanol
Use sodium hydroxide for treating scale insects and snails
Combine JADAM solutions for pest and disease control
Create natural disinfectant using JADAM components
Increase insecticidal effect by adjusting JWA and JHS amounts
Add red clay powder for better penetration of the solution
